record.field: Sales Orders help you manage quotations and orders from your customers. OpenERP suggests that you start by creating a quotation. Once it is confirmed, the quotation will be converted into a Sales Order. OpenERP can handle several types of products so that a sales order may trigger tasks, delivery orders, manufacturing orders, purchases and so on. Based on the configuration of the sales order, a draft invoice will be generated so that you just have to confirm it when you want to bill your customer.
